replies.body:
{{champion:53}}** Blitzcrank file #10. I have not seen Jarvan IV in quite some time. I have had his next date ready but he has seem to disappear. I wonder where he is?**

{{champion:59}} Oh my head. Where am I?

{{champion:28}} You are where I want you to be. 

{{champion:59}} Evelynn!? Why am I here and am I chain to the wall? 

{{champion:28}} We are going to do something that you are going to enjoy after a while. 

{{champion:59}} I don't think I will enjoy this.

{{champion:28}}  That's what all the guys I bring here say the first time. But now they come back by themselves often to get it again. 

{{champion:59}} *Gulp*

*Knock Knock Knock*

{{champion:28}} Who is it?

{{champion:102}} It's me.

{{champion:59}} !!!

{{champion:28}} Come in. 

{{champion:102}} Thank you. **!?** Oh Hi Jarvan. 

{{champion:59}} Shyvana please save me!!!

{{champion:102}} Save you? Ok but after Evelynn is done with me. 

{{champion:59}} WHAT!!? 

{{champion:28}} She on a weekly visit. 

{{champion:102}} But you were closed last week,  And I need it RIGHT NOW!!!

{{champion:28}} Ok ok, sit down right there and we will start right away. 

{{champion:102}} Oooohhh...yesssssss...this feels fantastic. 

{{champion:59}} You're...You're...giving her a Mani-Pedi

{{champion:28}} Well yeah what did you expect? 

{{champion:59}} Umm..nevermind. But why am I chained to this wall again?

{{champion:28}} Well when I try to give you one, you were extremely ticklish. You ended up hitting your head on the wall and knocking yourself out. I had to make sure you didn't do that again so I had to chain you up. 

{{champion:59}} Makes sense...I guess...

{{champion:102}} Less talk, more Mani-Pedi.

HAHA Laughed So hard when {{champion:102}} Came in!
Great Story, Keep It Up Dude!

{{champion:59}} That's what all the guys I bring here say the first time. But now they come back by themselves often to get it again. !!!!!
shouldnt it be {{champion:28}}?
and keep up the good work
What you talking about? I see {{champion:28}} there...oh wait..her passive went off..don't see her anymore.

Um, not to be rude in any way, I just had a little constructive criticism. I really enjoy reading these, but the grammatical errors are kind of distracting from the story. If the story was grammatically correct it would be much more easy to read. Keep up the good work.

It wasn't rude in anyway. 

I know my grammar is not the best. Most of the time I am writing this as soon as I wake up so I am still sleepy when I am putting them down. I just did a quick edit to it to correct some HORRIBLE grammar errors. Hope it more readable. :D
So its a MANi-Pedi?
Hilarious story Lightdragoon! (I vote for {{champion:131}} or {{champion:89}} next)

Heck that's an amazing idea I personally love leo so I'd totally vote for them also oh and lightdragoon88 try bringing in a jealous pantheon to the mix like man dropping into there picnic or something. Thanks =D
Oh don't worry. I already have an idea for these 3. I think I'll do it on Thursday sale.
let me guess they are gonna fight each other for jarvin.
Not even close.
Yeah they would fight over him!:)
Or on him
{{champion:59}} has a dirty mind... lol
Remember New Year's?
{{champion:59}} {{champion:102}} WE DO NOT TALK ABOUT THAT!!!!
That... was so unexpected haha I love these!
That what I was going for.

{{champion:84}} *Observes her nails as she moves her hands out from under the drier,* Great job as always, Evelynn.
{{champion:59}} *Turns his attention to the ninja,* You need to stop appearing like that!
{{champion:84}} I've been here for awhile. It isn't my fault you knocked yourself out before I arrived.
{{champion:59}} *Sighs.*

Awesome job lightdragoon88!

I vote {{champion:89}} since I've been playing her a lot lately.
keep it up man, i look forward to these every sale :)
is {{champion:143}}  in the story
No one ever notices that the last time there was a blitz files was #11, and this is #10
I just bought Creator Viktor 2 days ago...
I did the same thing with Sona and IP. Go through your launcher > store > Purchases  then under Action get a refund. You only get 3 so make it worth it.

Thanks, but I used all my refunds before level 10 lol. I didn't realize you could never get more, and didn't research champions on outside sources before buying them lol. I made a LOT of mistakes my first few levels.
Same here, wish they gave at least one more per season :/
Haha I feel you. I refunded champs that I ended up buying rather soon after I refunded them. I used my 400 level 3 rp on pantheon when he was on sale.

I used mine up fairly quickly too I remember a time that I refunded a galactic nasus skin during a random skin event once to get another galactic nasus skin that was my final refund I think it was mid S3 ish when that happened
you can contact riot. i've heard that they are normally willing to refund it if a person bought something within a few days of going on sale.
Yeah thanks, I did that. They refunded me :)
Not sure why this guy got dvoted.  Just because his advice doesn't apply to you (how was he supposed to know?) doesn't mean his advice wasn't constructive and with good-intention.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584
lightdragoon saves the day once again

And all I ask for in return is RP...I mean your thanks.

Yes..just your thanks...<_<
Tricky move there.
*Innocent whistle*
Thanks, I submitted a ticket. Hopefully I can get a partial refund.
Okay, so I was wondering if anyone has a guess for when the season will start?
